summary: Frontend adds a privacy dashboard UI with scanner, blocklist manager, and activity log, plus React Query hooks and a green/charcoal theme. Backend adds a Motoko actor with privacy settings and blocklist mutation scaffolding, but it appears to enforce authorization (trapping for unauthorized callers) and does not show the required default blocklist merge/reset behavior. Evidence of required generated image files being added is not present in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend must handle anonymous/unauthenticated usage gracefully (defaults used until user signs in), without crashes.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend privacy settings methods shown trap on missing permission, and the frontend calls getPrivacySettings even when using an anonymous actor. This would likely crash/throw rather than gracefully return defaults for anonymous users.
evidence: frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts (returns anonymous actor when not authenticated)

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend provides a default blocklist (hardcoded in canister) and merges it with user custom entries when returning the effective list.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend snippet shows default settings with blockList = [] and no evidence of a hardcoded default tracker list or merge logic in getPrivacySettings/get blocklist responses.
evidence: backend/main.mo (default PrivacySettings uses blockList = []; no default tracker domains shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend includes a reset-to-defaults API for privacy settings/blocklist.
missing_requirements.reason: No reset-to-defaults method is shown in the backend diff summary.
evidence: backend/main.mo (no reset method visible in provided content)

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated with specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references the images, but the diff summary does not show the image files being added (and omitted files list does not provide evidence they exist).

hallucinated_features.description: User profile system (get/save profile) and mandatory profile setup dialog flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for user profiles or name personalization; it only mentions per-principal privacy settings and optional authentication.
evidence: backend/main.mo (UserProfile types and get/save profile methods)
frontend/src/App.tsx (shows ProfileSetupDialog based on profile state)

hallucinated_features.description: Authorization/access control initialization with admin token read from URL (caffeineAdminToken) and _initializeAccessControlWithSecret call.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request admin-token based access control or secret URL parameters; it only allows Internet Identity if auth is used.
evidence: backend/main.mo (imports MixinAuthorization/AccessControl and traps on permission checks)
